segments.text: How come it is slow as a snail today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I wanted to look for some information on the company page just now . It took me almost one minute to open it . Then there is no response to any click .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have the same question . I can ’ t send out mails . We ’ d better call the IT department and ask them to check it immediately .
segments.speaker: S2
